title: Stephanie Davis puffs on a cigarette as she strolls along in workout gear after vomiting in the gym
text:
She's on a high after winning Best Actress at Inside Soap Awards 2019 earlier this month.

But Stephanie Davis proved her life isn't all glamour as she puffed on a cigarette while strolling through Rainhill, St Helens in workout gear on Monday, after vomiting in the gym during a 'tough session.'

The Hollyoaks actress, 26, recently revealed she's back in the gym after a year's break from training, and found her Monday morning personal training session particularly gruelling.

Tough morning: Stephanie Davis, 26, puffed on a cigarette while strolling through Rainhill, St Helens in workout gear on Monday, after vomiting in the gym during a 'tough session'

The soap star was clad in an oversized grey R-shirt, which she tied up in a knot, and strolled along in skin-tight cropped grey leggings with animal print down either side.

She teamed her sporty ensemble with trainers, with a black bag slung over her shoulder and boxing gloves bundled in her arms while she texted on her mobile phone.

The actress wore bronzer on her cheeks and the remnants of slept-on mascara visible, and styled her raven hair extensions into a half-up, half-down 'do.

Taking to Instagram, Stephanie revealed she vomited in the middle of her workout at Forge Fitness gym with personal trainer Rachel Ann Williams, because it was so intense.

Sporty: The soap star was clad in an oversized grey R-shirt, which she tied up in a knot, and strolled along in skin-tight cropped grey leggings with animal print down either side

Boxing beauty: She teamed her sporty ensemble with trainers, with a black bag slung over her shoulder and boxing gloves bundled in her arms while she texted on her mobile phone

Oh dear! Taking to Instagram, Stephanie revealed she vomited in the middle of her workout with personal trainer Rachel Ann Williams, because it was so intense

Following her work out she took to Instagram and shared a snap of herself with Rachel, writing alongside: 'Today I vomited half way trough the session haha, that was TOUGH! Starting Monday with a bang.'

Last week, Stephanie revealed that she hadn't been to the gym for a year, as she encouraged others to follow her fitness kick, and get active.

The mother-of-one tweeted: 'Wednesday morning session done. I've been training for so long now after not training for over a year, to be back in the full swing of it is amazing!

Pretty: The actress wore bronzer on her cheeks and the remnants of slept-on mascara visible, and styled her raven hair extensions into a half-up, half-down 'do

'The first session is the hardest just get yourself there, I find it so good mentally I literally haven't felt this good in years!

'The difference in my body is unbelievable, I'm toned, healthy, & in the best shape I've ever been in!'

'Mentally I'm the best too! Can't remember the last time I've felt this good!! Feel unstoppable releasing them endorphins, the gym is my happy place, absolutely LOVE it, too much ha.'
description: The Hollyoaks actress, 26, recently revealed she's back in the gym after a year's break from training, and found her Monday morning personal training session in Rainhill, St Helens particularly tough.
